TargetAudiences.Name: Eco-Conscious Consumers
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Individuals who prioritize sustainability and are willing to pay more for organic, eco-friendly products.

TargetAudiences.Name: Health-Oriented Families
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Families looking for healthy food options and organic produce to support a nutritious diet.

TargetAudiences.Name: Local Produce Advocates
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Shoppers who prefer to buy from local farmers to support the community and reduce food miles.

TargetAudiences.Name: Ethical Shoppers
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Consumers who are concerned with ethical labor practices and the socio-economic impact of their purchases.

TargetAudiences.Name: Zero-Waste Lifestyle Practitioners
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Individuals committed to reducing waste in their daily lives, seeking stores that align with their zero-waste goals.

TargetAudiences.Name: Subscription Service Enthusiasts
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Busy professionals who value convenience and eco-friendliness, and are interested in regular, sustainable grocery delivery.

TargetAudiences.Name: Sustainability Educators
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Teachers and influencers looking to partner with eco-friendly brands to educate their audience on sustainability.

TargetAudiences.Name: Community Organizations
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Local groups and non-profits focusing on food security, health, and environmental initiatives.

TargetAudiences.Name: Green Entrepreneurs
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Business owners who wish to stock their establishments with sustainable and ethically-sourced products.

TargetAudiences.Name: Dietary Restricted Consumers
TargetAudiences.Characteristics: Individuals with specific dietary needs looking for organic, gluten-free, non-GMO, or locally sourced food options.
